backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing products, documents, user profiles, Stripe payments, access control, and contact submissions.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all frontend components and files for reference.
Guide for configuring DNS records and verifying the custom domain dqmcomputer.com for the IC app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root container and linking to main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Lists dqmcomputer.com for IC domain verification.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app rendering payment status pages or main site sections with theme and query providers.
frontend/src/catalog/staticProducts.ts: Defines static product metadata with descriptions, categories, and image URLs plus a lookup helper.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section showing company intro, images, and service descriptions in a two‑section layout.
frontend/src/components/CancellationRefu: Empty component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact form component with validation, async submission, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with company info, quick links, contact details, and smooth scroll navigation.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with logo, nav links, mobile sheet menu, and smooth scroll handling.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, tagline, and buttons that scroll to products or contact.
frontend/src/components/PaymentFailure.t: Displays payment failure message with option to return to home page.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccess.t: Displays payment success confirmation with button to continue shopping.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Fetches and displays products by category with checkout handling and loading states.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Renders a services section showing a grid of service cards with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/Terms.tsx: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUs.tsx: Displays a feature grid explaining reasons to choose the company, each with an icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateCheckoutSess: Provides a mutation to create Stripe checkout sessions through the backend actor and parse the returned session JSON.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook to manage identity state, login flow, and stored sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching documents, products, contact submissions, and submitting forms using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and utility layers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s metadata and pending feature requests, including two items for adding a Facebook profile link to the footer.
